rules.description: All services must be defined using Effect.Service, not Context.Tag or Layer.succeed.
All functions (including service methods) must be defined as arrow functions assigned to consts (const fn = () => { ... }). No function declarations or class methods.
Do not use class methods for services or business logic. Use plain objects with arrow functions.
Do not use Context.Tag for service definitions. Use Effect.Service instead.
Do not use Layer.succeed for service definitions. Use Effect.Service instead.
